languages.text: "Должен быть способ! Мы не можем... я не могу просто стоять и смотреть на это!"
"There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
languages.original_text: "Должен быть способ! Мы не можем... я не могу просто стоять и смотреть на это!"

traits.locale_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Il doit y avoir un moyen ! On ne peut pas... Je ne peux pas rester là sans rien faire ! »
languages.original_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"

traits.locale_text: « Il doit y avoir un moyen ! On ne peut pas... Je ne peux pas rester là sans rien faire ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “肯定有办法！我们不能……我不能就这么眼睁睁地看着！”
languages.original_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"

traits.locale_text: “肯定有办法！我们不能……我不能就这么眼睁睁地看着！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「何か方法があるはずだ！私は…ここで黙って見ているわけにはいかない！」
languages.original_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"

traits.locale_text: 「何か方法があるはずだ！私は…ここで黙って見ているわけにはいかない！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Es muss einen Weg geben! Wir können doch nicht ... Wir können nicht einfach herumstehen und zusehen!"
languages.original_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"

traits.locale_text: "Es muss einen Weg geben! Wir können doch nicht ... Wir können nicht einfach herumstehen und zusehen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Tiene que haber un modo! No podemos... ¡me niego a quedarme mirando sin hacer nada!».
languages.original_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tiene que haber un modo! No podemos... ¡me niego a quedarme mirando sin hacer nada!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bir yolu olmalı! Onu bırakamayız... Elim kolum bağlı dikilip öylece izleyemem!"
languages.original_text: "There has to be a way! We can't... I can't simply stand here and watch!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir yolu olmalı! Onu bırakamayız… Elim kolum bağlı dikilip öylece izleyemem!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
